mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( email, nickname, search_word_list ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{nickName}, #{searchWordList, typeHandler=sullog.backend.member.mapper.typehandler.SearchWordListTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{email} and deleted_at = NULL
mapper.delete: UPDATE member SET deleted_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE email = #{email}
